snippet: Interpublic has picked Harris Diamond to take the place of Nick Brien, chairman and chief executive at the McCann Worldgroup since early 2010. Mr. Brien's departure followed speculation that Interpublic executives were dissatisfied.
abstract: Interpublic has picked Harris Diamond to take the place of Nick Brien, chairman and chief executive at the McCann Worldgroup since early 2010. Mr. Brien's departure followed speculation that Interpublic executives were dissatisfied.

headline.main: Leader of Largest Unit of Interpublic Group Is Replaced, as Rumors Had Predicted
